Articles.Content:
I was browsing the forums when this idea popped into my head. I think that, in the final-ish release of the game, there should be an extra game mode that allows you to create a new solar system to explore, similar to Universe Sandbox.

I do have doubts, however, due to the fact that Universe Sandbox is a game in itself, so kinda merging to games together is going to be hard.

Make sure to have your say below!
Given how I believe the current planets are fairly hard-coded I don't think this would work. It would be cool but I don't think it's feasible.

Given how I believe the current planets are fairly hard-coded I don't think this would work. It would be cool but I don't think it's feasible.

Just because the are currently doesn't mean they will always be because they may want to allow people to mod in planets at some point and providing this feature would basically allow noobs to create their own systems without any knowledge for modding but still leave all the awesome stuff to those who can because you can only have certain options in-game but if you're making it then there are no restrictions
